code: import{useState}from"react";import{useTaskContext}from"../contexts/TaskContext";import TaskItem from"./TaskItem";import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function TaskList(){const{users,selectedUser,addTask}=useTaskContext();const[input,setInput]=useState("");const user=users[selectedUser];if(!user)return null;const handleAdd=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(input.trim()){addTask(input.trim());setInput("");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{id:"mainTitle",children:["Tareas de ",user.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{id:"taskList",children:user.tasks.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"No hay tareas."}):user.tasks.map((t,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TaskItem,{task:t,idx:i},i))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleAdd,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"newTaskInput",value:input,onChange:e=>setInput(e.target.value),placeholder:"Nueva tarea..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"A\xF1adir Tarea"})]})]});}
